entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the morning then north 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear after midnight. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 23 February 2023
